datasource.name: 会议室预约管理系统数据库
datasource.id: 会议室预约管理系统数据库

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  b.booking_id,
  b.subject,
  r.name AS room_name,
  b.start_time,
  b.end_time,
  CASE
    WHEN b.status_code = 0 THEN '待审核'
    WHEN b.status_code = 1 THEN '预约成功'
    WHEN b.status_code = 2 THEN '已驳回'
    WHEN b.status_code = 3 THEN '已取消'
    WHEN b.status_code = 5 THEN '违约释放'
    WHEN b.status_code = 4 THEN '已完成'
    ELSE '未知'
  END as status_text,
  b.status_code
FROM booking b
JOIN meeting_room r ON b.room_id = r.id
WHERE b.user_id = {{ appsmith.store.user_id }}
ORDER BY b.booking_id DESC;
